properties.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 28 at 9:23AM PST until January 28 at 6:00PM PST by NWS Los Angeles/Oxnard CA
properties.description:
* WHAT...For the High Wind Warning, northeast winds 25 to 35 mph
with gusts up to 60 mph expected. For the Wind Advisory,
northeast winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 45 mph.

* WHERE...Santa Barbara County Mountains.

* WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, from 6 PM this evening to 10
PM PST Wednesday. For the Wind Advisory, until 6 PM PST this
evening.

* IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down large objects such as
trees and power lines. Power outages are expected. Travel will
be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Highways 101 and 154 will be affected with
the strongest winds in the Montecito Hills, San Marcos Pass, and
Gaviota/Refugio areas.
properties.instruction:
People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around
trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of
your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if
you must drive.

NWSheadline: WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM PST THIS EVENING... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST WEDNESDAY
